thread.section_title: Peaches Boutique Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Peaches Boutique | peachesboutique.com | 7 of 79
thread.title: Erin

author: Erin
title: Erin
text: I bought my prom dress online from Peaches Boutique and I could not be happier! My dress arrived in 5 days (just as they promised) and it came in perfect condition and was packaged neatly. I spoke with one of their customer service representatives as well to confirm that they had the dress I wanted and they were very nice and eager to help. I would definitely order another dress from them, they have a beautiful selection and made the hassle of online prom dress shopping easy and stress free!
